project_abstract.cdata: The aim of the Technology Advancement Project is to strengthen the small and medium industry (SMI) sector in technology intensive fields and to improve the quality of education in a center of excellence producing scientists and engineers. The project will finance specialized equipment and complementary inputs comprising facilities to house the equipment and the costs of installation, consumable materials and operation amd maintenance expenditures for three national institutions which play important roles in Korea's industrial/technological development.

P004153.docty: Project Completion Report,Loan Agreement,Staff Appraisal Report
